title: Unlocking Timeless Beauty: Discover the Power of Natural Facial Rejuvenation
description: Primary Care Provider & Board-Certified Acupuncture Physician & Doctor of Oriental Medicine in Florida. Acupuncture, Homeopathy, Chinese Herbs, Cupping, Gua Sha
cleaned_text: Our Vision Established in 2020, Acupuncture & Homeopathy Clinic strives to provide excellent quality treatment to all patients. We pride ourselves in looking after our patients with care, compassion, respect, and empathy. What We Treat Acupuncture is a safe and effective means of treating a wide range of medical conditions, including: Musculoskeletal: neck, shoulder, knee and back pain, carpal tunnel, sciatica, chronic pain, swelling, localized traumatic injury, sports injury, sprains, strains, tendonitis. Emotional And Psychological Conditions: Depression, insomnia, stress, anxiety, PTSD. Gynaecological: fertility, menstrual pain, PMS, menopause. Respiratory: asthma, colds and flu, cough, sore throat, seasonal allergies. Gastrointestinal: constipation, diarrhea, acid reflux, nausea, poor digestion, weight loss. Other: smoking cessation, chronic fatigue, anxiety, depression, autoimmune disorders, addictions, post-traumatic stress disorder, Meniere's disease.
